about_the_game:
A vividly colored tale of horror and mystery that will mess with your mind.

BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA is a third-person horror adventure game. Players will experience the "guchagucha" terror through the perspective of Garasu Yuki, a female university student, as she becomes entangled in the cursed fate swirling around the town of Utagamachi in Japan.

This latest title comes from Ichimatsu Suzuka, the creator behind the popular Japanese nostalgic horror games GOHOME and 夜詛YASO curse of soirée, which have collectively garnered over 95 million views on YouTube through gameplay and related videos.

Story

The university student Shoko Yuki is attacked by a strange creature while walking her beloved dog, Chocolat. Though Yuki manages to escape, she loses Chocolat, who vanishes along with something that slithers along the ground.

Determined to find Chocolat, Yuki ventures into Utaga-yama. As night falls and darkness envelops the area, Yuki attempts to search the mountain but is once again attacked by the mysterious creature crawling along the ground.

This marks the beginning of Yuki's encounter with the cruel and horrifying history of the town.

Features of the game

⚫︎ A retro and eerie world brought to life with stunning graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.

The setting is Utaga-yama, a small town in Japan from an old era. In the first half of the story, players control the protagonist, Shoko Yuki, as she explores Utaga-yama. The dense, overgrown mountains and traditional Japanese mansions evoke a sense of nostalgia, yet a pervasive eerie atmosphere lingers throughout.

⚫︎ A suffocating endless corridor where you frantically flee from the terror that pursues you.

As the story unfolds, the player’s character shifts to a young boy carrying his little sister. Before you, a blood-soaked killer wielding a katana appears and attacks. The mansion is vast, with seemingly endless, identical corridors that can easily disorient you, leaving you unsure of your location. With your sister on the verge of tears in your arms, will you be able to escape safely?

Controls

Move：Stick / WASD
Confirm：A Button / Left-click 
Action：X Button / E Key
Pause/Settings：Menu Button / Tab Key
Run：LT / Shift Key

About the Creator

Ichimatsu Suzuka

Ichimatsu Suzuka is a versatile creator who not only produces games and music but also engages in VTuber activities while appearing as an Ichimatsu doll. Known for a unique style that blends retro and sophisticated atmospheres with bold, dark horror elements, Suzuka has crafted a distinctive world. Suzuka gained popularity with the Japanese nostalgic horror games GOHOME and 夜詛YASO: Curse of Soirée.

"BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA" Video Submission Guidelines

The "BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA" Video Submission Guidelines (hereinafter referred to as the "Guidelines") are designed for users to submit videos (details are provided below) of the game content "BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA" (hereinafter referred to as the "Game"). The following guidelines are set forth in this document（Includes live streaming distribution）.

Users may post videos of themselves playing the "Game" by following the Guidelines.

Users are not required to contact us individually when they post videos of their games in accordance with these guidelines.

■Play videos that can be posted

Users may submit videos of players, including themselves, playing the Game in accordance with these Guidelines (videos that do not include the users themselves are not subject to these Guidelines).

In addition, when posting such videos, you may use screenshots of the Game in the thumbnails accompanying such videos (These are hereinafter collectively referred to as "Play Videos").

■Editing Play Videos

You may edit and process the videos you post, and use them in so-called "Live game play" by combining them with your face and voice.

In this case, the following three conditions must be observed:

➀You may not extract only some of the elements included in the game, such as background music or images of characters.

➁You may not infringe on the rights of any third party by processing or editing the video of your play.

➂Any other excessive editing or processing that prevents a correct understanding of the contents of this game is prohibited.

■Prohibited items when posting play videos

The following actions are prohibited when posting videos of users playing the game. In addition, regardless of whether or not the following prohibited acts are applicable, please delete your submission as soon as possible upon request from the Company.

・Posting for commercial purposes. However, monetization using the system on the posted video distribution site shall not be regarded as a commercial purpose, as long as it is interpreted in accordance with these guidelines.

・Submission for the purpose of religious or political activities.

・Including contents that are offensive to public order and morals, or combining them with illegal information.

・Unauthorized reproduction of videos created by third parties other than the user.
